# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes

(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)(?i)third[-_]?party/
(?:^|/)3rdparty/
(?:^|/)data-unblocker\.ts$
(?:^|/)go\.sum$
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)Pipfile$
(?:^|/)pyproject.toml
(?:^|/)requirements(?:-dev|-doc|-test|)\.txt$
(?:^|/)vendor/

\.all-contributorsrc$
\.avi$
\.bmp$
\.bz2$

\.drawio$

\.eot$
\.eps$
\.exe$
\.gif$

\.gitattributes$
\.gitkeep$
\.graffle$
\.gz$
\.icns$
\.ico$
\.ipynb$
\.jar$
\.jks$
\.jpe?g$
\.key$
\.lib$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\..
\.mo$
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.o$
\.ocf$

\.p12$
\.parquet$
\.patch$
\.pdf$

\.pfx$

^\.github/actions/spelling/
^\Q.github/workflows/spelling.yml\E$
^\Qpackages/api/src/router/channel/types.ts\E$
^\Qpackages/api/src/router/users/accounts/types.ts\E$
^\Qpackages/config/eslint-config-custom/src/playground.ts\E$
^\Qpackages/hooks/src/analytics/user-identifier.tsx\E$
^\Qpackages/ui/src/user-page.tsx\E$
